examples: I didn’t realize (that) you were so unhappy.
No me di cuenta de que eras tan infeliz.
The moment I saw her, I realized something was wrong.
En el momento en que la vi, me di cuenta de que algo andaba mal.
I finally came to realize that he would never change.
Finalmente me di cuenta de que nunca cambiaría.
It is important to realize that there are still potential problems.
Es importante darse cuenta de que todavía existen problemas potenciales.
